entry.title: WIND WARNING IN EFFECT, Kimmirut
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:19 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kimmirut Airport 3:00 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.3°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: NE 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
